article_title: GE's $3B Retiree Health Cut Escalates Employer Exodus

article_metadata.description: The disclosure by General Electric that it will save billions of dollars as it pares the healthcare coverage of thousands of its retirees is the latest in a series of blows to the once-rich benefit packages at some of the nation’s best-known companies. One by one, employers like GE, AT&T, IBM [...]
article_metadata.author: Bruce Japsen
